Address.value: 3150 ALMADEN EXPRESSWAY SUITE 250, SAN JOSE, California, 95118, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Anixa Biosciences Inc, a cancer-focused biotechnology company, is engaged in harnessing the body's immune system in the fight against cancer. The company is developing both diagnostics and therapeutics to detect cancer early, which is curable, and to treat those afflicted once diagnosed. Its segment includes CAR-T Therapeutics; Cancer Vaccines; Anti-Viral Therapeutics and others.
